caption.title: Alignment of sGP proteins from ZEBOV virus Gabon 2002 used in monkey experiments with Makona 2014 used to characterize mAbs generated in this study.
caption.p: Sequences GenBank accession numbers are as follows: EBOV/H.sap/GIN/14 (KT765131) and EBOV/H.sap/GAB/02 (AGB56831). Alignment was performed using MultiAlign website [ 38].
Click here for additional data file.
